game_description: The first step is to run the program on a PC with the Windows operating the system, select the first lesson (only one lesson is available in the free version) And then connect from a virtual reality headset I attached the manual TeacherBuild - https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9N2G5GVRPPN6 Our team developed a gamified solution and curriculum for classroom and individual remote teaching the robotics in VR for students. We are tackling the problems of early professional orientation and equal access to education. Schools with underserved or underrepresented students could benefit from our scaled and cost-effective solution.
review_1: This app is exactly what I am looking for for my son ! He is a big fan of lego mindstorm. Unfortunately, when I connect to the app it asks for a code name and then an error occurs. Who can help me to find a way to join a group and test this fantastic app ?! Many thanks
